page.title: 16CROAL COTTON MILL
page.content: Mrs C*** came to our school for an interview about Croal Mill.We asked her some questions about Croal Mill. Mrs C*** worked at Croal Mill for seven years and she retired because of sickness. Croal Mill has got five floors, also it has got a canteen on the third floor. Mrs C*** worked at a desk, she enjoyed it. She said the mill was very clean. The mill has been operational for about 60 years. Croal Mill produced Long-John's and shirts for the navy. Mrs C***'s uncle used to work at Croal Mill. They did not wear shoes because the floors were so clean and polished but they used to get spinters in their feet. Mrs ***'s uncle used to work on a cotton machine that stretched very thin cotton and wound it up into a roll.
